subConfigs.name: CWDTEN[2]
optionDescription: 0 = Please refer to the spec for detail
1 = Please refer to the spec for detail

subConfigs.name: CWDTPDEN
optionDescription: 0 = Watchdog Timer clock kept enabled when chip enters Power-down.
1 = Watchdog Timer clock is controlled by LIRCEN (CLK_PWRCTL[3]) when chip enters Power-down.

subConfigs.name: CFGXT1
optionDescription: 0 = Select HXT in external clock soruce mode
1 = Select HXT in crystal mode

subConfigs.name: CBOV
optionDescription: 000 = Brown-out voltage is 1.6V.
001 = Brown-out voltage is 1.8V.
010 = Brown-out voltage is 2.0V.
011 = Brown-out voltage is 2.2V.
100 = Brown-out voltage is 2.4V.
101 = Brown-out voltage is 2.6V.
110 = Brown-out voltage is 2.8V.
111 = Brown-out voltage is 3.0V.

subConfigs.name: CBORST
optionDescription: 0 = Brown-out reset Enabled after powered on.
1 = Brown-out reset Disabled after powered on.

subConfigs.name: CBODEN
optionDescription: 0= Brown-out detect Enabled after powered on.
1= Brown-out detect Disabled after powered on.

subConfigs.name: ICELOCK
optionDescription: 0 = ICE function Disabled.
1 = ICE function Enabled.

subConfigs.name: CIONIN
optionDescription: 0 = All GPIO set as Quasi-bidirectional mode after chip powered on.
1 = All GPIO set as input tri-state mode after powered on.

subConfigs.name: CBS
optionDescription: 0 = Boot from LDROM with IAP mode.
1 = Boot from APROM with IAP mode.

subConfigs.name: MBS
optionDescription: 0 = Boot from Secure Bootloader, and ignored CBS setting.
1 = Boot from APROM or LDROM, depended on CBS value.

subConfigs.name: CWDTEN[1:0]
optionDescription: 00 = Please refer to the spec for detail
01 = Please refer to the spec for detail
10 = Please refer to the spec for detail
11 = Please refer to the spec for detail

subConfigs.name: UART1PSL
optionDescription: 000 = Please refer to the spec for detail
001 = Please refer to the spec for detail
010 = Please refer to the spec for detail
011 = Please refer to the spec for detail
100 = Please refer to the spec for detail
101 = Please refer to the spec for detail
110 = Please refer to the spec for detail
111 = Please refer to the spec for detail
